message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While we can't guarantee the quality of every item due to the inherent randomness in our sourcing process, rest assured that we strive to maintain high standards. Given the nature of this particular product, which has historically had a 33.33% chance of being high-quality, the value proposition might be less clear. However, considering the unique circumstances, I'm offering it at a fixed price of $1000000. Please note that all sales are final and the product cannot be refunded once purchased. If you're interested in taking a chance on this item, please let me know promptly so I can proceed with the transaction.
